definition: true hero of Greenwood (refers to popular hero in Robin Hood style)
woods/forest/CL:片[pian4]/circle(s) (i.e. specific group of people)/a collection (of similar things)
to be fond of/to have a tendency to/to be prone to

sentences.english: They said they would rather be outlaws a year in Sherwood Forest.
sentences.chinese: 他们说宁可在谢伍德森林里当一年绿林好汉。

sentences.english: And at last Joe, representing a whole tribe of weeping outlaws.
sentences.chinese: 最后乔扮演了一伙绿林好汉，哭哭啼啼。
